name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Access via Malicious Script
description: This playbook aims to mitigate the risks following an incident where an attacker utilized a malicious PowerShell script for unauthorized access and data exfiltration.

parallel--bc0c7e5f-edb7-49ac-9c87-6d74a9.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--bc0c7e5f-edb7-49ac-9c87-6d74a9.description: Execute actions in parallel to mitigate the attack.

action--3ed8cc0d-f88d-4c4d-82e8-b2186e28.name: Kill Malicious PowerShell Process
action--3ed8cc0d-f88d-4c4d-82e8-b2186e28.description: Terminate any PowerShell processes related to the malicious script execution.

action--16aaedcd-f1b0-4e6c-93a8-a9e6aa7b.name: Delete Dropped Sensitive Files
action--16aaedcd-f1b0-4e6c-93a8-a9e6aa7b.description: Remove any sensitive files that may have been dropped by the attacker.

action--eb1ff1ec-b5c0-4b88-a74e-04620928.name: Scan for Additional Malicious Scripts
action--eb1ff1ec-b5c0-4b88-a74e-04620928.description: Continuously scan for any additional malicious scripts until none are found.

commands.command: while ! grep -q 'malicious_pattern' /path/to/scripts/*; do echo 'Scanning for malicious scripts...' && sleep 10; done
